column4: I have this strange high frequency sound coming out of my case. I'm sure its pcspeaker. I muted him in alsa-mixer and removed and blacklisted mod. Anyone have any other idea ? I dont wanna disconnect it from mobo.
I forgot: it is present when ever I play audio.
I'd just remove it, it's not like they're useful anyway
yeah but I dont wanna do that as only solution.
